text: Dora and Naomi love the holiday workshops at My Art Studio. There is a good variety of workshops and both of them are able to understand the description in the brochure and choose the workshops they are interested in. During the workshop, they also enjoy the process of creating their own masterpiece and have joy in explaining how they crafted the items. Thank you for organizing new workshops every holiday!

Had fun last year with my friend so back for a second workshop! Teacher Husna and Teacher Mala are both very patient and kindly walked us through each step and gave us lots of tips - really liked how they encourage us to find our own style.

Perfect for anyone who like to try something new and creative!

Had a great time with my friends at the wooden coaster painting workshop. Teacher Husna and Mardy are very friendly and guided us throughout. Our artwork turned out really beautiful~ Will definitely come back to try other workshops! :)

I took a clay lesson there before. Teacher Husna was very friendly and patient when conducting her lesson. She makes sure my masterpiece was done up nicely as she helped with touching it up to make it look so much nicer. Because of her, I want to take up more lessons, so I'm looking forward to more affordable short lessons if there are in the future :)
